mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, William Ledyard (possibly) to Charles-René-Dominique Sochet Destouches, 1781 February 21
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ledyard, William, 1738 - 1781?
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A translation of a letter, likely written by Ledyard, William(?). Ledyard writes to Destouches supplying intelligence on disposition of the British fleet at Gardiner's Bay including a small map showing the various ships in line relative to the shoreline. The report notes the presence of eight vessels ranging in strength from 50-74 guns. Autograph document, 2 pages, with integral address panel.
